oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of William Grundy Crowley, Confederate veteran
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Maj. Crowley was F & S (Field and Staff) 23rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, wounded at Shiloh, taken to Corinth and later Jackson, Miss. to recuperate. Became a chancellor judge in DeKalb County, Tenn. where he was from; pictured with crutch and cane, presumably from his wound.
